alert.note: Alert for Madison; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 25 at 10:44AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Rankin and Madison Counties. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 303.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 308.5 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 303.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 309.4 feet on 02/14/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Ratliff`s Ferr 303.0 303.9 Thu 10 am CD 307.8 308.5 308.3 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
